title: How to Make Lemon Based Cocktails

steps.headline: Assemble the following ingredients:
steps.description: 3/4 oz (22.5 ml) lemon juice 2 oz (60 ml) gin 1 cube sugar or a dash of sugar syrup  3/4 oz (22.5 ml) club soda.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the lemon juice, gin and sugar into the shaker.
steps.description: Shake well. Variations that you can also add include a dash of fresh cream or 3 dashes of orange flower water. Some variations include a dash of egg white but many prefer to not use this.

steps.headline: Strain the drink into a highball glass.
steps.description: Top up with the soda (adding soda can be optional).

steps.headline: Garnish with a sprig of mint or a twist of lemon peel.
Assemble the following ingredients:
steps.description: 1 1/2 oz (45 ml) vodka  3/4 oz (22.5 ml) lemon juice 1 tsp sugar syrup.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the ingredients into the cocktail shaker.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Serve garnished with a twist of lemon peel.
Assemble the following ingredients:
steps.description: 1 1/2 oz (45 ml) vodka 1/2 oz (15 ml) lemon juice, preferably from Meyer lemons 1/2 oz (15 ml) lemongrass infused simple syrup  Dash of soda.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the ingredients into the shaker, except for the soda.
Strain into a highball glass.
Add a sprig of rosemary.
steps.description: Be sure that enough is sitting in the drink to help infuse the flavor of rosemary into it.

steps.headline: Assemble the following ingredients:
steps.description: 1 1/2 oz (45 ml) light rum 3/4 oz (22.5 ml) lemon juice 1 small egg white (use pasteurized if worried about egg safety) 1/2 oz (15 ml) crème de cacao.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the ingredients into the shaker.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.
Assemble the following ingredients:
steps.description: 2 oz (60 ml) Scotch whiskey 1/2 oz (15 ml) lemon juice Dash of apple juice 1 cube of sugar or dash of sugar syrup.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour in the ingredients.
Strain into a highball glass.
Serve garnished with a lemon twist and add a straw.
Assemble the following ingredients:
steps.description: 1 oz (30 ml) citron vodka 1 oz (30 ml) limoncello 1 teaspoon orange rind, finely grated 1 cup ice cubes 3 medium scoops lemon sorbet.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the vodka, limoncello, citrus rind and ice cubes into the cocktail shaker.
Shake well.
Place the sorbet into a pre-chilled glass.
Pour the shaken cocktail mixture over the sorbet.
Serve garnished with a lemon twist and a straw.

Rosemary lemon fizz Assemble the following ingredients: 1 1/2 oz (45 ml) vodka 1/2 oz (15 ml) lemon juice, preferably from Meyer lemons 1/2 oz (15 ml) lemongrass infused simple syrup  Dash of soda.
